3 namespace Ubiquity\views\engine;

5 use Twig\Environment;
6 use Twig\TwigFunction;
7 use Twig\TwigTest;
8 use Twig\Loader\FilesystemLoader;
9 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
10 use Ubiquity\controllers\Router;
11 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
12 use Ubiquity\core\Framework;
13 use Ubiquity\events\EventsManager;
14 use Ubiquity\events\ViewEvents;
15 use Ubiquity\exceptions\ThemesException;
16 use Ubiquity\translation\TranslatorManager;
17 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
18 use Ubiquity\themes\ThemesManager;
19 use Ubiquity\assets\AssetsManager;
20 
31 class Twig extends TemplateEngine {
32  private $twig;
33  private $loader;
34 
35  public function __construct($options = array()) {
36  $loader = new FilesystemLoader ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS );
37  $loader->addPath ( implode ( \DS, [ Startup::getFrameworkDir (),"..","core","views" ] ) . \DS, "framework" );
38  $this->loader = $loader;
39 
40  if (isset ( $options ["cache"] ) && $options ["cache"] === true) {
41  $options ["cache"] = CacheManager::getCacheSubDirectory ( "views" );
42  }
43 
44  $this->twig = new Environment ( $loader, $options );
45 
46  if (isset ( $options ["activeTheme"] )) {
47  ThemesManager::setActiveThemeFromTwig ( $options ["activeTheme"] );
48  $this->setTheme ( $options ["activeTheme"], ThemesManager::THEMES_FOLDER );
49  unset ( $options ["activeTheme"] );
50  } else {
51  $this->loader->setPaths ( [ \ROOT . \DS . 'views' ], "activeTheme" );
52  }
53 
54  $this->addFunction ( 'path', function ($name, $params = [], $absolute = false) {
55  return Router::path ( $name, $params, $absolute );
56  } );
57 
58  $this->addFunction ( 'url', function ($name, $params) {
59  return Router::url ( $name, $params );
60  } );
61 
62  $this->addFunction ( 'css', function ($resource, $parameters = [], $absolute = false) {
63  if ($this->hasThemeResource ( $resource )) {
64  return AssetsManager::css_ ( $resource, $parameters, $absolute );
65  }
66  return AssetsManager::css ( $resource, $parameters, $absolute );
67  }, true );
68 
69  $this->addFunction ( 'js', function ($resource, $parameters = [], $absolute = false) {
70  if ($this->hasThemeResource ( $resource )) {
71  return AssetsManager::js_ ( $resource, $parameters, $absolute );
72  }
73  return AssetsManager::js ( $resource, $parameters, $absolute );
74  }, true );
75 
76  $this->addFunction ( 't', function ($context, $id, array $parameters = array(), $domain = null, $locale = null) {
77  $trans = TranslatorManager::trans ( $id, $parameters, $domain, $locale );
78  return $this->twig->createTemplate ( $trans )->render ( $context );
79  }, [ 'needs_context' => true ] );
80 
81  $test = new TwigTest ( 'instanceOf', function ($var, $class) {
82  return $var instanceof $class;
83  } );
84  $this->twig->addTest ( $test );
85  $this->twig->addGlobal ( "app", new Framework () );
86  }
87 
88  protected function hasThemeResource(&$resource) {
89  $resource = str_replace ( '@activeTheme/', "", $resource, $count );
90  return $count > 0;
91  }
92 
93  protected function addFunction($name, $callback, $safe = false) {
94  $options = ($safe) ? [ 'is_safe' => [ 'html' ] ] : [ ];
95  $this->twig->addFunction ( new TwigFunction ( $name, $callback, $options ) );
96  }
97 
98  /*
99  * (non-PHPdoc)
100  * @see TemplateEngine::render()
101  */
102  public function render($viewName, $pData, $asString) {
103  $pData ["config"] = Startup::getConfig ();
104  EventsManager::trigger ( ViewEvents::BEFORE_RENDER, $viewName, $pData );
105  $render = $this->twig->render ( $viewName, $pData );
106  EventsManager::trigger ( ViewEvents::AFTER_RENDER, $render, $viewName, $pData );
107  if ($asString) {
108  return $render;
109  } else {
110  echo $render;
111  }
112  }
113 
119  public function getBlockNames($templateName) {
120  return $this->twig->load ( $templateName )->getBlockNames ();
121  }
122 
128  public function getCode($templateName) {
129  return UFileSystem::load ( $this->twig->load ( $templateName )->getSourceContext ()->getPath () );
130  }
131 
138  public function addPath(string $path, string $namespace) {
139  $this->loader->addPath ( $path, $namespace );
140  }
141 
150  public function setTheme($theme, $themeFolder = ThemesManager::THEMES_FOLDER) {
151  $path = \ROOT . \DS . 'views' . \DS . $themeFolder . \DS . $theme;
152  if ($theme == '') {
153  $path = \ROOT . \DS . 'views';
154  }
155  if (file_exists ( $path )) {
156  $this->loader->setPaths ( [ $path ], "activeTheme" );
157  } else {
158  throw new ThemesException ( sprintf ( 'The path `%s` does not exists!', $path ) );
159  }
160  }
161 }
